attributes.action: Allow carers to claim their time for each person they care for and to  receive a much better carer's allowance  tax free.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Most carers look after more than one person and care in excess of 50 + hours per week with little or no respite. This saves the Goverment in the region of £57 billion per year. AT THE MOMENT CARERS CAN ONLY CLAIM FOR ONE PERSON SO ALL OTHER HOURS GO UNRECOGNISED.  Most carers are loosing their earning potential of many thousands per year and finding it hard to manage as the Carers allowance no-where near makes up for lost earnings.This has to change?
